misc: Might have trouble getting to the tee on time
biography: Jaakko, a name synonymous with both passion and occasional tardiness, hails from the esteemed Hirsala Golf club. A true aficionado of the finer things, Jaakko is as comfortable on the green as he is in a wine cellar, often regaling fellow golfers with his extensive knowledge of vintages.

With three past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jaakko brings a wealth of experience to the competition. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy remain elusive, Jaakko's dedication and sportsmanship are beyond reproach. One might observe that he has yet to secure a victory in either the team or individual format of the competition. However, he is to be admired for his unwavering commitment to the sport.

Despite not participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, Jaakko remains an active member of the Hector community. Whether he will grace us with his presence in future tournaments remains to be seen, but one thing is certain: his passion for golf, and perhaps a perfectly aged Cabernet Sauvignon, will never fade.
